result.title: Why contests aren't held on Saturday evening?
result.content: I just realized that many previous Div. 2 (and some Div. 1, too) contests and the next contest are held on Sunday evening (in Asian countries they're held on Sunday night, sometimes Monday morning). Why problemsetter won't hold a contest on Saturday evening? I think Saturday evening is much better to code than Sunday evening, because when we wake up on the next day morning â€” it is Sunday morning and we have enough time to sleep.
